original: 吾與洛陽白馬寺天竺僧曇柯迦羅交善。其常言佛法無邊，三千世界，須彌芥子，佛無處不在，並示之以吾，吾大駭，深以為奇異。
text: I have friendship with Tan Ke Jialuo, a Tianzhu monk of Baima Temple in Luoyang. As the saying goes, Buddhism is boundless, three thousand worlds, Xume mustard seeds, Buddhas are everywhere, and he shows that I am shocked, and I think it is strange.
